USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

--Create view for "vw_cafv_elegibility" file
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility
GO 

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility
AS 
    SELECT 
        cafv_eligibility_ID,
        classification
        FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'bronze/cafv_eligibility.json',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
        ) 
        WITH(
            jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
        ) AS cafv_eligibility
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
        WITH (
            cafv_eligibility_ID SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility',
            classification VARCHAR(100)
        );

Select * from bronze.vw_cafv_elegibility
GO



--Create view for "vehicle_type" file
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_vehicle_type
GO 

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_vehicle_type
AS 
    SELECT 
        vehicleType, electric_vehicle_type
        FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'bronze/vehicle_type.json',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'            
        ) 
        WITH(
            jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
        ) AS vehicle_type
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
        WITH (
            vehicleType SMALLINT,
            electric_vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) '$.electricVehicleType'
              )
        GO

SELECT * from bronze.vw_vehicle_type
GO


--Create view for "vehicle_registration_csv" file
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
AS
 SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',                
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) WITH (
        vehicleId       INT,
        locationId      SMALLINT,
        propietaryId    TINYINT,
        dolVehicleId    INT,
        registrationDate    DATETIME2(7)
    ) AS [result]
    GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv

SELECT COUNT(1)
FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
WHERE year = '2024' AND month = '01';
